attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"If one man is deluded, he is insane, if a million are deluded, it is a religion." (Unknown).

Religion (a.k.a. delusions of supernaturality) is the cause of the vast majority of wars around the world and thus should be abolished.

For too long has religion been used to justify atrocities of years gone by and years to come in the name of <insertNonExistentGodNameHere>.

Let us stamp out this mental illness once and for all.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
